keyword: how many calories in dum dum pops
title: How Many Calories in Dum Dum Pops?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in Dum Dum pops per lollipop, including carbs, sugars, and nutrition facts for this classic treat.
h1: How Many Calories in Dum Dum Pops?
assumptions: Standard Dum Dum lollipop (cherry or assorted flavors), ~7 g each, no stick included in weight.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor and manufacturing; values are approximate. Check packaging for exact details.

quick_answer.text: One Dum Dum pop contains about 25 calories, mostly from sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Mystery flavor variation (slightly different sugar content)
Sugar-free version (if available, using artificial sweeteners)

faqs.q: How many calories in one Dum Dum pop?
Are Dum Dum pops high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, one pop has about 6 g of sugars with no fiber.

faqs.q: Do Dum Dum pops have any protein or fat?
faqs.a: Negligibleâ€”0 g protein and 0 g fat per pop.

faqs.q: How many calories in a pack of Dum Dums?
faqs.a: A typical bag has 40 pops, so around 1,000 calories total.

faqs.q: Can Dum Dum pops fit in a low-calorie diet?
faqs.a: At 25 kcal each, they're a low-calorie candy option in moderation.
